name: cell agents (GGJ2020)
description:
Control:  WASD or ↑↓←→ to move 

Brife Gameplay Intro: The virus will spread to its neighbour cells, player can get close to the cell to 'repair' the infected cell 

Goal: Remove the virus and infected cells, and carry antibodies to keep the rest cells healthy.

Different status of the cell: Blue - normal status Green - cell with antibody Red - infected cell Purple - cell with virus( virus can spread through this cell ) Dark Blue - dead cell
